scripts.socketstart: yarn wsservers && yarn apigatestart && yarn client
scripts.wsservers: start yarn wsserversm && start yarn wsserversc
scripts.wsserversm: cd server && cd APIGateway && cd websocket && node index.ws.server.master.js
scripts.wsserversc: cd server && cd  APIGateway && cd websocket && node index.ws.server.client.js
scripts.apiserver: cd server && cd APIGateway && cd ExpressApi && node index.api.js
scripts.wsclient: cd APIGateway && cd websocket && node index.ws.client.js
scripts.apigatestart: start yarn apiserver && start yarn apigate2
scripts.apigate: cd server && cd APIGateway && node index.gate.api.js
scripts.dev: start yarn server && start yarn wsserver && yarn client
